Content: Species should have sub sepcies, representing genetical modifications,
natural evolution and castes like for ants. The latter implies that
population growtwh has to viewed species and non species wide. In the
ant example there would be a quees subspecies and for every member an
certain number of worker, queen, drone and soldier subspecies would be
born, meaning the growth of worker-ants is only dependent on the number
of queen ants not worker ants. (Maybe sexual species should keep track
of the male to female ratio in general).
